name: The Knight, the Ranger, and the Wizard
name_original: The Knight, the Ranger, and the Wizard
description:
Knight > Wizard > Ranger > Knight About:

The Knight, the Ranger, and the Wizard saves their guildmates that gone OUT OF CONTROL due to corruption.

A game made within 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Inspired by Total Party Kill by AdventureIslands and A Puzzling Combination by Blackthornprod.

--------------------------

Controls:
  • Space / Z = Switch Hero
  • Esc = Quit
  • R = Restart

--------------------------

Features:
  • A card-based game.
  • Rock-paper-scissors-style gameplay.
  • Randomly-generated enemies.
  • Fight with each unique heroes: Knight, Ranger, and Wizard.
  • Complete with 7 levels.

--------------------------
